name: TeamUp Inc.
description: Developer of an online sports leagues and tournaments management application designed to track individual players' stats. The company's platform follows a multiple-tier revenue model based on subscriptions, commissions, advertising and monetization of big data, enabling customers to get a big enough pool of players, and enough data, to begin their scouting activities.
one_liner: Developer of an online sports leagues and tournaments management application designed to track individual players' stats. The company's platform follows a multiple-tier revenue model based on subscriptions, commissions, advertising and monetization of big data, enabling customers to get a big enough pool of players, and enough data, to begin their scouting activities.
